GK19ksbhm06u:2: devīṃ sarasvatīṃ vyāsaṃ tato jayamudīrayet // Bhmj_6.1 //
GK19ksbhm06u:11: viṣamastho na hantavyo na ca senāvinirgataḥ /
GK19ksbhm06u:12: na nivṛtte raṇe ceti maryādāṃ cakrire nṛpāḥ // Bhmj_6.6 //
GK19ksbhm06u:17: divyaṃ gṛhāma nayanaṃ svayaṃ yuddhaṃ vilokaya /
GK19ksbhm06u:23: ayaṃ te nikhilaṃ yuddhaṃ kathayiṣyati saṃjayaḥ /
GK19ksbhm06u:27: saureṇa pīḍitā gāḍhaṃ rohiṇī jvalitā diśaḥ /
GK19ksbhm06u:30: kimanyadrājamahiṣī hā mahī na bhaviṣyati // Bhmj_6.15 //
GK19ksbhm06u:32: lakṣavyaktaṃ jayasyaitaddharmo yatrāsti tatra saḥ // Bhmj_6.16 //
GK19ksbhm06u:34: taralā hyasidhāreyaṃ niścayo nātra gaṇyate // Bhmj_6.17 //
GK19ksbhm06u:36: papraccha dvīpasaṃsthānaṃ sa ca pṛṣṭho 'bhyabhāṣata // Bhmj_6.18 //
GK19ksbhm06u:38: sphāraṃ sudarśanaṃ dvīpaṃ nikhilaṃ pratibimbitam // Bhmj_6.19 //
GK19ksbhm06u:49: sthānaṃ sukṛtināṃ yatra vikhyātā gaṇḍikā iti // Bhmj_6.24 //
GK19ksbhm06u:69: matvā jagāda govindaṃ viṣaṇṇaḥ karuṇānidhiḥ // Bhmj_6.33 //
GK19ksbhm06u:70: aho vata vimūḍhānāṃ rājyaleśe sukhāya naḥ /
GK19ksbhm06u:78: akāṇḍe dhairyasārasya keyaṃ kātaratā tava // Bhmj_6.37 //
GK19ksbhm06u:80: nijāṃ kulasthitiṃ pārtha na dharmyāṃ hātumarhasi // Bhmj_6.38 //
GK19ksbhm06u:81: saṃyuktaṃ vā viyuktaṃ vā nityaṃ dehena dehinam /
GK19ksbhm06u:84: dehino 'sya tathā dehāḥ sataḥ sattāvivarjitāḥ // Bhmj_6.40 //
GK19ksbhm06u:86: sahate yo viluptātmā nirvāṇaṃ tasya śāśvatam // Bhmj_6.41 //
GK19ksbhm06u:90: sata evāsya satataṃ na virāmaḥ śarīriṇaḥ // Bhmj_6.43 //
GK19ksbhm06u:92: jayājayau samaṃ matvā viśa svargonmukho raṇam // Bhmj_6.44 //
GK19ksbhm06u:111: sa mahābdhirivākṣobhyaḥ sthitiṃ brāhmīṃ prapadyate // Bhmj_6.53 //
GK19ksbhm06u:116: karma durmatiyogyaṃ māṃ praśaṃsasi vimohayan // Bhmj_6.55 //
GK19ksbhm06u:124: śreyo hyakarmaṇaḥ karma na yajñaḥ karmaṇā vinā /
GK19ksbhm06u:136: taranti hi tamo ghoraṃ nityaṃ manmatavartinaḥ // Bhmj_6.64 //
GK19ksbhm06u:141: iti pṛṣṭo hṛṣīkeśo jagāda jagatāṃ patiḥ /
GK19ksbhm06u:148: yasya taṃ duḥsahaṃ śatruṃ kāmarūpa vināśaya // Bhmj_6.70 //
GK19ksbhm06u:150: sūryeṇāptaḥ purā matto yogo 'yaṃ manunā tataḥ /
GK19ksbhm06u:153: na tatsmṛtipathaṃ yātaṃ kiṃtu te prāktanaṃ vapuḥ // Bhmj_6.72 //
GK19ksbhm06u:154: ahaṃ tu nityadharamasya sthitaye guptaye satām /
GK19ksbhm06u:155: yuge yuge bhavāmyeṣa vināśāya dṛrātmanām // Bhmj_6.73 //
GK19ksbhm06u:157: tvamapyasakto niṣkāmaḥ kuru karma kulocitam // Bhmj_6.74 //
GK19ksbhm06u:159: svocitaṃ phalahīnaṃ ca viruddhaṃ ceti bhedataḥ // Bhmj_6.75 //
GK19ksbhm06u:161: jānātyakarmaṇaḥ pāpātkarma yaśca sa buddhimān // Bhmj_6.76 //
GK19ksbhm06u:167: tatkarmāṇyātmayogāgnau hutvā yānti parāṃ gatim // Bhmj_6.79 //
GK19ksbhm06u:169: prāṇāpānādiha viṣo dhṛtvā nāḍīṣu dhāraṇam // Bhmj_6.80 //
GK19ksbhm06u:171: te prayānti paraṃ dhāma yajñaśiṣṭāmṛtāśinaḥ // Bhmj_6.81 //
GK19ksbhm06u:175: kālena śraddadhānānāṃ svayaṃ jñānaṃ prasīdati // Bhmj_6.83 //
GK19ksbhm06u:182: karmayogastu saṃnyāsādviśiṣṭa iti me matiḥ // Bhmj_6.86 //
GK19ksbhm06u:184: saktā api na sajjanti paṅke ravikarā iva // Bhmj_6.87 //
GK19ksbhm06u:186: ajñānapihite jñāne kiṃ tveṣā karmavāsanā // Bhmj_6.88 //
GK19ksbhm06u:188: brāhmaṇe vā śvapāke vā vibudhāḥ samadṛṣṭayaḥ // Bhmj_6.89 //
GK19ksbhm06u:192: nāsāntare samau dhṛtvā prāṇāpānau vimuktaye // Bhmj_6.91 //
GK19ksbhm06u:203: manaḥ saṃyamya paśyanti sravatyetadyato yataḥ // Bhmj_6.96 //
GK19ksbhm06u:204: ātmānaṃ māṃ ca sarvatra mamātmani tathākhilam /
GK19ksbhm06u:207: etadākarṇya kaunteyaḥ punaḥ papraccha keśavam // Bhmj_6.98 //
GK19ksbhm06u:211: ciraṃ bhuktvā sukhaṃ divyaṃ sa kalyāṇapuraḥ saraḥ // Bhmj_6.100 //
GK19ksbhm06u:212: bhogināṃ yogināṃ vāpi saṃbhūto mahatāṃ kule /
GK19ksbhm06u:214: tapo jñānādhikaṃ yogaṃ tasmādyogī bhavārjuna // Bhmj_6.101 //
GK19ksbhm06u:216: mayi nyastamanā nityaṃ bhaktyā māṃ vetti mānava /
GK19ksbhm06u:219: sarve matprāṇitā bhāvā mayi sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam // Bhmj_6.103 //
GK19ksbhm06u:220: devīṃ māyāṃ dadhānaṃ māṃ na jānāti vimohitaḥ /
GK19ksbhm06u:221: ye tu jānanti māṃ māyāṃ bhavanti kṛtinaḥ sadā // Bhmj_6.104 //
GK19ksbhm06u:222: arthī jijñāsurārto vā jñānī vā māṃ prapadyate /
GK19ksbhm06u:223: priyaḥ priyasya satataṃ jñāninastvasmi gocare // Bhmj_6.105 //
GK19ksbhm06u:225: vāsudevaḥ sarvamiti yajante māṃ mumukṣavaḥ // Bhmj_6.106 //
GK19ksbhm06u:236: paryante bhāvatulyā hi nṛṇāṃ janmāntarasthitiḥ // Bhmj_6.111 //
GK19ksbhm06u:238: parastāttamaso nityaṃ ye smaranti raviprabham // Bhmj_6.112 //
GK19ksbhm06u:240: omityekākṣaraṃ brahma japanto yānti te param // Bhmj_6.113 //
GK19ksbhm06u:242: paraṃ māṃ pratipannāste na bhavanti bhave punaḥ // Bhmj_6.114 //
GK19ksbhm06u:249: sarvakartari bhūtāni mayi santi na teṣvaham /
GK19ksbhm06u:250: lokāḥ sthitā na sthitāśca mayi vyomnīva vāyavaḥ // Bhmj_6.117 //
GK19ksbhm06u:252: asaktaṃ māṃ na jānanti malināmoghadarśinaḥ // Bhmj_6.118 //
GK19ksbhm06u:253: sarvaṃ sarvagataṃ yajñaṃ vedyaṃ bījaṃ bhavābhavam /
GK19ksbhm06u:260: bhūyo 'pi me śṛṇu sakhe prītyā yatpratibodhyase /
GK19ksbhm06u:261: na tattvenāmaragaṇā munayo vā vidanti mām // Bhmj_6.122 //
GK19ksbhm06u:263: tadahaṃ sarvabhūtātmā na hi kiṃcinmayā vinā // Bhmj_6.123 //
GK19ksbhm06u:269: kiṃtu viśvamayaṃ rūpaṃ draṣṭumicchami te vibho // Bhmj_6.125 //
GK19ksbhm06u:279: draṣṭuṃ tadeva paryantarahitaṃ notsahe vapuḥ // Bhmj_6.130 //
GK19ksbhm06u:291: dīptyā dravanti rakṣāṃsi sthāne tava janārdana // Bhmj_6.136 //
GK19ksbhm06u:293: anantaṃ śāśvataṃ dhāma sarvātmānaṃ punaḥ punaḥ // Bhmj_6.137 //
GK19ksbhm06u:295: ukto 'si kṛṣṇa govinda yādaveti purā mayā // Bhmj_6.138 //
GK19ksbhm06u:298: prasīda darśaya vibho vapuḥ saumyaṃ tadeva me /
GK19ksbhm06u:299: śāntiṃ me yāti sahasā nānyatā vyathitaṃ manaḥ // Bhmj_6.140 //
GK19ksbhm06u:302: devā api na paśyanti mamedaṃ sarvagaṃ vapuḥ /
GK19ksbhm06u:306: avyaktamakṣaraṃ ye ca teṣāṃ ke 'dhikayoginaḥ // Bhmj_6.143 //
GK19ksbhm06u:313: vaśe yadi na te cittamabhyāsena gṛhāṇa tat /
GK19ksbhm06u:314: tatrāpyaśakto matkarmā satataṃ śreyase bhava // Bhmj_6.147 //
GK19ksbhm06u:319: udāsīnaḥ śucirdakṣaḥ kṣamī bhaktaḥ priyo mama /
GK19ksbhm06u:322: kṣetraṃ tatsavikāraṃ tu māyā bhūtādi ca sthitam // Bhmj_6.150 //
GK19ksbhm06u:326: jñeyaṃ tu manmayaṃ brahma śuddhaṃ sadasatoḥ param // Bhmj_6.152 //
GK19ksbhm06u:329: prakṛtiḥ karaṇe heturbhoktā tu puruṣaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GK19ksbhm06u:331: tatsaṃgamācca vistāraṃ sa yāti brahma śāśvatam /
GK19ksbhm06u:333: bhautike 'pi sthitaḥ kāye sarvavyāpī na lipyate // Bhmj_6.155 //
GK19ksbhm06u:339: sattvaṃ prakāśakaṃ jñeyaṃ yadutthaiḥ stambhakaṃ rajaḥ /
GK19ksbhm06u:342: guṇadoṣāśca dṛśyante te te kila śarīriṇām // Bhmj_6.159 //
GK19ksbhm06u:349: svabhāvabhūmāvavṛtaṃ jānīte yaḥ sa vedavit // Bhmj_6.162 //
GK19ksbhm06u:355: paśyanti jñāninaḥ sarvajagatāṃ jīvanaṃ param // Bhmj_6.165 //
GK19ksbhm06u:357: manmayā dhṛtimanto māṃ bhajante puruṣottamam // Bhmj_6.166 //
GK19ksbhm06u:359: abhīḥ sattvaṃ śucirjñānaṃ damo dānaṃ tapaḥ kratuḥ /
GK19ksbhm06u:363: yukto 'pi satataṃ divyasaṃpadā mā śucaḥ sakhe /
GK19ksbhm06u:373: ma(sa)tkarma na parityājyaṃ tyājyaṃ tu vidhigarhitam // Bhmj_6.173 //
GK19ksbhm06u:378: karma kartā ca buddhiśca trividhā guṇabhedataḥ /
GK19ksbhm06u:379: dhṛtiḥ sukhaṃ ca traiguṇyāttrividhaṃ dehināṃ matam // Bhmj_6.175 //
GK19ksbhm06u:380: yathoktasevī niḥsaṅgaḥ kuru karma nijaṃ sakhe /
GK19ksbhm06u:382: idaṃ bhaktāya te jñānamupadiṣṭaṃ mayā svayam /
GK19ksbhm06u:394: yācñā kṛtāñjalirupaiti parānyadeṣa śūrāstadiṅgitajaḍāḥ pṛthagityavocan // Bhmj_6.182 //
GK19ksbhm06u:396: tatpādalagnamukuṭaḥ prakaṭaṃ praṇamya lebhe tadāśiṣamaśeṣamahīpajaitrīm // Bhmj_6.183 //
GK19ksbhm06u:398: abhyāyayau tava sutaḥ svakurūnnirasya dhāvanti tulyagumameva nṛṇāṃ manāṃsi // Bhmj_6.184 //
GK19ksbhm06u:406: bhrātṛbhiḥ sahito vīrairdhunāno vipulaṃ dhanuḥ // Bhmj_6.188 //
GK19ksbhm06u:410: duḥśāsano 'pi nakulaṃ sahadevaṃ ca durmukhaḥ // Bhmj_6.190 //
GK19ksbhm06u:421: anye ca vīrā rājāno rājasiṃhāḥ prahāriṇaḥ /
GK19ksbhm06u:440: unmamātha śarāgreṇa haimaṃ kesariṇaṃ rathāt // Bhmj_6.205 //
GK19ksbhm06u:443: sa kuñjarendraḥ śalyasya pādena caturo hayān /
GK19ksbhm06u:445: tato madrādhipaḥ kruddhaḥ śaktiṃ śaktimatāṃ varaḥ /
GK19ksbhm06u:451: tasya śalyo 'tha gadayā vidārya dalaśo ratham /
GK19ksbhm06u:453: śaṅkho hatāśvaḥ sahasā phalguṇasya rathaṃ yayau /
GK19ksbhm06u:463: kṣīyamāṇasya samare satyaṃ śreyastapo mama // Bhmj_6.216 //
GK19ksbhm06u:465: ko mucyeta raṇe prāpya bhīṣmaṃ bhīṣmaparākramam // Bhmj_6.217 //
GK19ksbhm06u:467: dhruvaste vijayo rājanyasya yoddhā dhanaṃjayaḥ // Bhmj_6.218 //
GK19ksbhm06u:469: saubhadraśca raṇe kruddho hanyādeva gaṇānapi // Bhmj_6.219 //
GK19ksbhm06u:471: mithaḥ kathayatāṃ teṣāṃ sā jagāma vibhāvarī // Bhmj_6.220 //
GK19ksbhm06u:487: niruddhāṃ śarajālena nādṛśyanta diśo daśa // Bhmj_6.228 //
GK19ksbhm06u:488: na dadarśa tayoḥ kaścidantaraṃ kṣipatoḥ śarān /
GK19ksbhm06u:505: dṛṣṭvā duryodhano rājā sānugaḥ svayamādravat // Bhmj_6.237 //
GK19ksbhm06u:509: jahnuḥ śirāṃsi śūrāṇāṃ phalānīva mahīruhām // Bhmj_6.239 //
GK19ksbhm06u:513: avahāraṃ raṇe cakre vāsarānte pitāmahaḥ // Bhmj_6.241 //
GK19ksbhm06u:536: hṛdi viddho nimagnena mumoha bhṛśavihvalaḥ // Bhmj_6.251 //
GK19ksbhm06u:540: pratyudyayau samāśvasya tūrṇaṃ rājā suyodhanaḥ // Bhmj_6.253 //
GK19ksbhm06u:546: madabhāgyavaśānna syādyadi pārtheṣu vaḥ kṛpā // Bhmj_6.256 //
GK19ksbhm06u:550: yattu śakyaṃ mayā kiṃcidvṛddhenādya karomi kim // Bhmj_6.258 //
GK19ksbhm06u:562: ekenaikena bāṇena bhinneṣu triṣu dantiṣu // Bhmj_6.264 //
GK19ksbhm06u:581: uvāca sātyakiṃ vīraṃ yudhyamānaṃ prayatnataḥ // Bhmj_6.273 //
GK19ksbhm06u:582: tiṣṭhantu yāntu vā sarve sātyake pṛtanāgragāḥ /
GK19ksbhm06u:583: eṣa svayaṃ nihanmyadya sānugaṃ śantanoḥ sutam // Bhmj_6.274 //
GK19ksbhm06u:587: na rūpaṃ sehire draṣṭuṃ surā api divi sthitāḥ // Bhmj_6.276 //
GK19ksbhm06u:589: śobhāṃ bheje sa nīlādreḥ sarpatsaṃdhyābhraśālinaḥ // Bhmj_6.277 //
GK19ksbhm06u:591: dhīraḥ śāntanavo dṛṣṭvā dhunāno dhanurabhyadhāt // Bhmj_6.278 //
GK19ksbhm06u:595: hato jagannivāsena dhanyatāṃ yātvayaṃ janaḥ // Bhmj_6.280 //
GK19ksbhm06u:599: uvāca saṃhara vibho kopaṃ viśvakṣayocitam // Bhmj_6.282 //
GK19ksbhm06u:601: iti prasādya taṃ pārtho rathamāropayatpunaḥ // Bhmj_6.283 //
GK19ksbhm06u:615: saṃdhyayā dikṣu jātāsu śoṇitena bhṛtāsviva // Bhmj_6.290 //
GK19ksbhm06u:617: māṃsapiṇḍa iva graste ghoreṇa dhvāntarakṣasā // Bhmj_6.291 //
GK19ksbhm06u:633: sa hatvā cāmaraṃ śūraḥ pauravyatanayaṃ nṛpam /
GK19ksbhm06u:662: śabdena tasthurālīya sarve saṃkucitā gajāḥ // Bhmj_6.313 //
GK19ksbhm06u:666: saṃdhyāyāṃ durjayaṃ matvā bhīṣmastaṃ bhīmavikramam // Bhmj_6.315 //
GK19ksbhm06u:673: devena viṣṇunā guptā na jeyāḥ pāṇḍavā iti // Bhmj_6.318 //
GK19ksbhm06u:675: prādurbhūtaṃ svayaṃ viṣṇuṃ tuṣṭāva sahasāṃ nidhim // Bhmj_6.319 //
GK19ksbhm06u:682: avatīrṇā bhuvaṃ nātha dānavā ye hatāstvayā /
GK19ksbhm06u:683: teṣāṃ vadhāya dṛptānāṃ mānuṣī tanumāviśa // Bhmj_6.323 //
GK19ksbhm06u:684: iti stutāḥ padmabhuvā devo nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥ /
GK19ksbhm06u:687: naraśca vijayo dhīraḥ pravaraḥ sarvadhanvinām // Bhmj_6.325 //
GK19ksbhm06u:689: iti jñātvā śamaḥ putra kriyatāṃ pāṇḍunandanaiḥ // Bhmj_6.326 //
GK19ksbhm06u:693: hatānāṃ hanyamānānāṃ ghnatāṃ ca samare mithaḥ /
GK19ksbhm06u:696: bhīṣmamukhyaiśca te sene bhinne saṃśayamāpatuḥ // Bhmj_6.329 //
GK19ksbhm06u:721: vimohaṃ vidadhe teṣāṃ mohanāstreṇa pārṣanaḥ // Bhmj_6.341 //
GK19ksbhm06u:727: hṛdi nirdārito bheje mūrchāṃ vyathitamānasaḥ // Bhmj_6.344 //
GK19ksbhm06u:740: unnanāda dhanadhvāno rathamasya jaghāna ca // Bhmj_6.350 //
GK19ksbhm06u:741: sa hatāśvaṃ samutsṛjya rathaṃ putrasya saṃbhramāt /
GK19ksbhm06u:758: mādrīsutau tataḥ śalyaṃ vidhāya virathaṃ śaraiḥ /
GK19ksbhm06u:760: svayaṃ yudhiṣṭhiro rājā nṛpaṃ jitvā śrutāyudham /
GK19ksbhm06u:761: vigāhya kauravānīkaṃ vidadhe vimukhaṃ śaraiḥ // Bhmj_6.360 //
GK19ksbhm06u:767: pārthena ca trigarteṣu jagāmāstaṃ divākaraḥ // Bhmj_6.363 //
GK19ksbhm06u:776: droṇasya ca samudbhrāntapatākaṃ vidadhe ratham // Bhmj_6.367 //
GK19ksbhm06u:780: mahodaraṃ maṇḍitakaṃ sunābhaṃ ca nihatya tān // Bhmj_6.369 //
GK19ksbhm06u:782: kṣayāya sarvajagatāṃ devai rudra ivoditaḥ // Bhmj_6.370 //
GK19ksbhm06u:786: uktaḥ purā surapure tāṃ yuddhabhuvamāyayau // Bhmj_6.372 //
GK19ksbhm06u:794: sa niṣaṅgaṃ dhanurdīptaṃ nanāda balināṃ varaḥ // Bhmj_6.376 //
GK19ksbhm06u:795: tato māyāṃ samāśritya mahatīṃ mohanīṃ nṛṇām /
GK19ksbhm06u:796: yuyudhāte samāviśya tau nabho bhīmavikramau // Bhmj_6.377 //
GK19ksbhm06u:800: tadvamanto viṣaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ bhogānbhogabhṛtāṃ varāḥ // Bhmj_6.379 //
GK19ksbhm06u:806: rurāva yena vasudhā cacāla sakulācalā // Bhmj_6.382 //
GK19ksbhm06u:822: virāṭaṃ dīrghabāhuṃ ca subāhuṃ kanakadhvajam // Bhmj_6.390 //
GK19ksbhm06u:831: śastraṃ nyāsaya gāṅgeyamahaṃ jeṣyāmi pāṇḍavān // Bhmj_6.394 //
GK19ksbhm06u:835: utthāya bhīṣmaśibiraṃ pratasthe bhrātṛbhiḥ saha // Bhmj_6.396 //
GK19ksbhm06u:845: śayānaṃ ratnaparyaṅke praṇanāma vilokya tam // Bhmj_6.401 //
GK19ksbhm06u:849: bhujastrailokyavijaye paryāpta iti me matiḥ // Bhmj_6.403 //
GK19ksbhm06u:861: na sehire taṃ bhūpālā māninaḥ saṃhatā api // Bhmj_6.409 //
GK19ksbhm06u:865: nipetuḥ sahasā yodhā bahavo vigatāsavaḥ // Bhmj_6.411 //
GK19ksbhm06u:866: draupadeyaiḥ puraḥ prāptaiḥ sa vidhāya raṇaṃ kṣaṇam /
GK19ksbhm06u:884: khadyotā iva vṛkṣeṣu śalabhā iva śāliṣu /
GK19ksbhm06u:887: cakāra samare bhīṣmaḥ svayaśoviṣadā diśaḥ // Bhmj_6.422 //
GK19ksbhm06u:891: rājñāṃ hatānāṃ bhīṣmeṇa jīvā iva nabhaścarāḥ // Bhmj_6.424 //
GK19ksbhm06u:907: yasya tvaṃ jagatāṃ nātho vadhāya svayamudyataḥ // Bhmj_6.432 //
GK19ksbhm06u:909: avaruhya tataḥ kṛṣṇamānināya rathaṃ punaḥ // Bhmj_6.433 //
GK19ksbhm06u:916: jagāda rājakaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhinnaṃ bhīṣmeṇa duḥkhitaḥ // Bhmj_6.436 //
GK19ksbhm06u:921: alaṃ rājyena me tāvaditi vādini dharmaje /
GK19ksbhm06u:924: pālayāmi raṇe bhīṣmaṃ paśyatāṃ jagatībhujām // Bhmj_6.440 //
GK19ksbhm06u:928: sa hi māmāśiṣā pūrvaṃ vātsalyātsamayojayat // Bhmj_6.442 //
GK19ksbhm06u:929: iti niścitya kṛṣṇena bhrātṛbhiśca sahāśu kṛt /
GK19ksbhm06u:932: papraccha vijayopāyaṃ sa ca pṛṣṭastamabravīt // Bhmj_6.444 //
GK19ksbhm06u:933: na taṃ paśyāmi lokeṣu vīro māṃ vijayeta yaḥ /
GK19ksbhm06u:934: jayalābhe ca yuṣmākaṃ mayi jīvati kā kathā // Bhmj_6.445 //
GK19ksbhm06u:935: na viśastrena saṃtraste na strīpūrve mameṣavaḥ /
GK19ksbhm06u:936: patanti tasmātklīvena māṃ ghātaya śikhaṇḍinā // Bhmj_6.446 //
GK19ksbhm06u:938: akāma iva duḥkhena yayau svaśibiraṃ nṛpaḥ // Bhmj_6.447 //
GK19ksbhm06u:948: yudhi yudhyasva vā mā vā na me jīvangamiṣyasi // Bhmj_6.452 //
GK19ksbhm06u:961: vadhāya kuru kaunteya yatnaṃ me nṛpatikṣayāt /
GK19ksbhm06u:962: viṣaṇṇo 'haṃ bhṛśaṃ putra raudreṇānena karmaṇā // Bhmj_6.459 //
GK19ksbhm06u:964: sṛñjayāḥ saha pāñcālaiḥ somakaiśca sahādravan // Bhmj_6.460 //
GK19ksbhm06u:966: āvārya bhīṣmarakṣāyai dvandvaṃ yuddhāni cakrire // Bhmj_6.461 //
GK19ksbhm06u:975: vimānā iva gāṅgeyo mahāstraṃ saṃjahāra tat /
GK19ksbhm06u:982: chidyamāneṣu bāleṣu tasya tūrṇaṃ kirīṭinā // Bhmj_6.469 //
GK19ksbhm06u:984: śaikhaṇḍīṃ śaramālāṃ tāṃ śairoṣīmiva peśalām // Bhmj_6.470 //
GK19ksbhm06u:991: viśanti mama marmāṇi bilaṃ viṣadharā iva /
GK19ksbhm06u:994: ityuktvā pāṇḍuputrāya śaktiṃ cikṣepa śaktimān // Bhmj_6.475 //
GK19ksbhm06u:1004: tato nivṛtte saṃgrāme hāhākāre nabhaḥspṛśiḥ // Bhmj_6.480 //
GK19ksbhm06u:1012: sthito 'smīti ca gāṅgeyo nigadya yaśasāṃ nidhiḥ // Bhmj_6.484 //
GK19ksbhm06u:1016: dhāraṇaṃ lambamānasya śiraso me vidhīyatām // Bhmj_6.486 //
GK19ksbhm06u:1018: jagrāha śāsanāttasya tribhiḥ pārthaḥ śaraiḥ śiraḥ // Bhmj_6.487 //
GK19ksbhm06u:1020: pāṇḍavaiḥ kriyatāṃ saṃdhirityuvāca ca kauravam // Bhmj_6.488 //
GK19ksbhm06u:1031: bhajasva pārtheṣu śamaṃ vīrāste bhrātarastava // Bhmj_6.493 //
GK19ksbhm06u:1033: jāne sarvamavaśyaṃ tu bhavitavyamidaṃ prabho // Bhmj_6.494 //
GK19ksbhm06u:1035: anujānīhi māṃ tāta samarāya samudyatam // Bhmj_6.495 //
GK19ksbhm06u:1039: patihitamanīkaṃ sāmyamāpa drutānāṃ sarayapavanapānīkampitānāṃ vanānām // Bhmj_6.497 //
